overview: Charan alias Cherry (Bharat) is a too good boy. He is shy and can't talk or befriend girls. He is studying engineering, but he is fairs poorly in his studies. Accidentally he meets a girl, Sivani (Videesha), in the MMTS station, who was drunk. He saves her and takes her to a hotel room just out of fear from the police. The incident repeats once again. He befriends her. Though she is a junior to him, Sivani always commands him.
title: Maa Iddari Madya
